text: Phir tumhara kya khayal hai ke behtar Insaan woh hai jisne apni imarat ki buniyad khuda ke khauf aur uski raza ki talab par rakkhi ho ya woh jisne apni imarat ek waadi ki khokli besabaat kagar par uthayi (edge of a bank about to collapse) aur woh usey lekar seedhi jahannum ki aag mein jaa giri? Aisey zalim logon ko Allah kabhi seedhi raah nahin dikhata
